name: d3
tagline: A software deployment and patch management system for OS X, built on the Casper Suite.
body:
d3 is a software deployment and patch manangement system for OS X that enhances the capabilities of the Casper Suite from [JAMF Software](http://www.jamfsoftware.com/). It was created by Pixar Animation Studios.


* [Welcome](https://github.com/PixarAnimationStudios/depot3/wiki/Welcome)
* [Documentation](https://github.com/PixarAnimationStudios/depot3/wiki)
* [Source](https://github.com/PixarAnimationStudios/depot3/)
* [Ruby Gem](https://rubygems.org/gems/depot3)

## Contact

* [Email](mailto:d3@pixar.com)
* [Macadmins Slack Channel](https://macadmins.slack.com/messages/#d3/) (@glenfarclas17)
